text: I really wish one of you would shut the Temple doors to stop you lighting pointless fires1:10. Fires were lit on the altar to burn up the sacrifices. God is saying he doesn't want such sacrifices. They are pointless, because they do not represent any repentance on the part of the worshipers. on my altar! I am not pleased with you, says the Lord Almighty, and I will not accept offerings from you.
